title: ‘Russia’s Vladimir Putin is a butcher’: US President Joe Biden after meeting Ukrainian refugees in Warsaw - Times Now
content:
1. ‘Russia’s Vladimir Putin is a butcher’: US President Joe Biden after meeting Ukrainian refugees in Warsaw  Times Now
  2. Russia Ukraine War: Joe Biden Arrives In Poland | Ground Report From Warzone With Gaurav Sawant  India Today
  3. Russia-Ukraine war live updates: Ukraine conflict has been a strategic failure for Russia, says Biden  Times of India
  4. NATO Article 5 "Sacred Commitment" For US: Joe Biden  NDTV
  5. Joe Biden Takes Stock Of Refugee Crisis In Poland, Briefed On Humanitarian Response To Crisis  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: US President Joe Biden has warned Russia not to move on an “inch” of NATO territory, as he delivered a major address on the Ukraine conflict Saturday in Warsaw. “Don’t even think about moving on one single inch of NATO territory,” Biden warned saying the alliance will defend itself “with the full force of our collective power.”
